Name: Salvatore Meets
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.
Review: A refreshing zesty lemon Daiquiri topped with a splash of champagne.
History: Created in 2015 by Salvatore Calabrese at his bar in the Playboy Club, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Salvatore Meets contains 180 calories
